oF3WRtuVwrveey9Y92fjFA.text: The wait staff was very slow and inattentive.   Considering most of the work is automated and pay at your table our waiter still took 10 min longer for my son's meal than the rest of us and then never checked on us after that. I was not happy with the service but the food is the same as any other chili's.

KCMVT1VFkV5b3w0yUCnd1Q.text: So everybody knows I pretty much only eat at Chillis out of desperation. But I found 2 awesome things here. 1. Gotta get the skillet cookie. Omg. It looks and taste like the picture - when does that ever happen? Cause I  can't say the same for the chipotle ribs... The cookie though - best thing I ever ate.. At Chills. 2. Jacob, my waiter. He made my entire experience phenomenal! Again, when does that ever happen? Rare. I'd go back for those two things alone! Next time you go, ask for Jacob and tell'em I sent ya ;)

1k79vUTnpIsIpA_q-IdxWA.text: We were forced to stop somewhere for dinner when driving back home, and this happened to be the only chain on the side of the road. I'm just glad it was a Chili's since that is one of the few chains that I don't mind going to when the need arises.  We hopped in at around 7pm on a Sunday and were seated immediately. The waitress came right over to take our orders but seemed a bit sad that we didn't order alcoholic drinks. Sorry we were in the middle of a several hour car ride where drinking isn't the smartest idea!   My wife ordered the shrimp tacos and they were pretty tasty. The shrimp was cooked nicely so it had that little bit of firmness on the outside, and the sauce that it was served with was a good, and a tad spicy. I ordered the babyback ribs smoothered in their beer-infused bbq sauce. Chili's ribs are the best ribs I've ever had at a chain restaurant and these were no different. They were succulent and tender and down-right delicious. I also enjoyed the sauce which was sweet yet had a bit of a bite to it. I also had the mashed potatoes and they were nothing to right home about...just dry, tasteless lumps.   Is Chili's my ideal dinner location? Heck no, but it was the best option on that stretch of 74. I wouldn't go out of my way to eat there again, but if I ever find myself heading back home from the in-laws again and this place happens to come up around supper time, I won't hesitate to stop in again.

T35Kzi_jOyx8FWmwDMvFEQ.text: The service was fine.  However the food was pretty disgusting.  I ordered some tacos that tasted like it was out of a tacobell drive thru at 2 am.  The meat on them was over seasoned and had a lot of gristle.  The worst part is that they put a garlic butter sauce on the tacos.  I normally enjoy garlic, but why put it on tacos!!??  I used to really like the chilis chain but I feel like there food quality has plummeted.

TPBkSHFqIByturVMrThpzA.text: Slow service. Cold food. Overpriced. Done with this place.

hdSrVaD0BQLY8UoSGPvbZg.text: AWFUL ,even the manager  does not have customer service  skills. I will never  go back there.  I can't tell you  how bad this location is. Not clean, not friendly  employees, ...... I could keep  typing,but I wont, for now. THE WORST EXPERIENCE I'VE  HAD AT ANY RESTAURANT!!!!!!!

GAFguhMw-SwgqY0bAtcz_w.text: The WORST food and the WORST service all in one. It took over 15 minutes just to get water. We did the two for twenty and had to send the chips and salsa back twice because they were both stale and cold. After nearly an hour of waiting for our food our waiter had forgotten about us. The manager brought out our main course and they were wrong. To top it all off the food was terribly undercooked. Once we finished "eating" it took another 15 minutes for someone to come by just so we could ask for our check. I usually enjoy my experience at Chilis but not this time. This was the absolute worst restaurant experience I have ever had. I recommend eating somewhere else when in the Matthews area.

58EXCtvk5kbV-lnipkQYng.text: My wife and I stopped in here last night. We were seated promptly and our server took our order right away. We each had the baby back ribs. Both our orders were burned and the server never came back to check on us. It was the manager who finally came over and we sent our ribs back and he did refill our drinks. Not a very good experience.

iZ-iUKPKIr4hzNBlOyJ7UA.text: The guy working the bar area was great. He was courteous and genuine. The food was good.

Z5QLc_2q6Ixf8VRRDl0WxQ.text: Another Chili's, I'm rating it 4 because it was very clean, great service, and the servers are attractive. nothing to complain about.

3rOhfIg1ow3UIBLCRAJTQQ.text: Very very typical Chilis.  I've been here quite a few times. If you're looking for something low-calorie, I would not come here.  They have a pretty good selection, and I really loved their onion strings they used to have. There were a few occasions where my fiance and I just went to this location for that appetizer.  The service has been good every time we've been! I will definitely go back.

XqrFdZeuN47oLpUfabLfmA.text: I went to two weeks ago after graduation since there was literally no other place open at 10pm. My boyfriend got there first and requested a table for 10. The rest of us get there and wait patiently for someone to come and take our drink order. We wait at least 15 minutes before a friend of mine gets up and starts asking random servers to send OUR SERVER to our table. Dude finally comes and takes our drink order.  We were so upset we made him go ahead and take our food order. It takes another 15 MINUTES for us to get our beverages!!! The service was just UNACCEPTABLE. We kept complaining and the manager came and personally apologized to us. He gave us a free cheese dip to try and calm the waters. Our food still took another 30 minutes to get to the table. I ordered the classic sirloin and requested it be cooked medium. When I got the sirloin it was WELL WELL DONE. Needless to say I was very upset. I took one bite and sent it back. The manager apologized and did not charge us for the plate. Not sure what was going on this night but the service was absolutely horrible. I have eaten here before but never experience such unpleasant service.

oSWeCCDEDkqAl8HM9HHz-g.text: I am absolutely outraged by the experience I had at your establishment this evening and have never been treated so horribly at a place I spend my money on a regular basis. I was enjoying a Saturday night at Chili's, in Matthews when the greeter of the restaurant came to the table and ask myself and the member of my party did we come to complain since the original drink I ordered for the bar was made with traditional margarita instead of mango margarita mix. First off I never complained in the first place my waiter got this issue taken care of in a timely manner and she was great. I stated I'm able to tell the difference between the 2 drinks, I was in the restaurant and had a wonderful experience by the waiter Ryan. The doorman during this evening was Larry and my experience was absolutely horrible today first off if he's the greeter he has no business being all the way back by the tables near the kitchen. He called me a bougie bitc* and said he doesn't care if I tell the manager of.

nYgKFVlK8gr5tXCC2KOJtQ.text: This was one of the worst experiences I have had.i work in one of the busiest restaurants in Charlotte, I will leave the name out to save myself.but that will show how I know what I'm talking about.i ordered a beer at the bar and told the bartender that I would be ordering food to go as soon as I sat down, and yes I noticed that the bartender had a section along with the bar so I don't blame him at first for giving his tables attention, but ignored me after I told him this and turned his attention to his other tables and bar patrons.my beer was completely warm and when I ordered my food and informed the bartender I was not offered a replacement beer or anything he just took it away as if it was my fault, and after that I kindly asked to speak to a manager after leaving a more than 20% tip so again leaving no reason to be treated like an inconsiderate costumer, I was approached by the manager with my food togo and all she had to say was here's your food anything else I can get for you? I only mentioned my warm beer and how I also am a server so not being a pain and she came off as she didn't care and I was in the wrong.there was no consolation as an unhappy customer at all, had I not been a server and understood the business I would've made a complete scene.but the way I was treated even telling the manager that I was currently in the industry makes me feel like this establishment does not care about their customers and as long as they make enough to pay their cooks per hour they are ok.so please if any type of upper management see this review I would love to speak to you and explain this situation, again based on my job being based on reviews

s4ZmssoEdRNdz7e-wofRpw.text: I just discovered this Chilis earlier in the week since it's close to my job I said I'd treat myself today. I was extremely disappointed with my service at Chilli's. I came in and placed a ToGo order and waited over an hour before I got my food. I am used to timely service from the Chili's At other locations. I finally contacted a manager and told him I'd been waiting a while. There didn't seem to be any care to make things right. It was as if this happens a lot. I want to be able to give my business here since it's a convenient location but my experience makes it hard to want to visit again or impeded others.

jH9PW1mJbC9z5oCeTUf5XQ.text: I'm done with Chili's! Used to be the best but not anymore. There last evening, my margarita was way too salty in the mix itself, complained to waitress who said "oh too bad" had to ask her to replace it! My Cajun pasta came COLD & DRY, had to send back. My son had a burger who said yes to "special sauce" but no tomato when ordering. It came with tomato and no sauce!! Bottom line, service and food not good anymore which seems a pattern with all chili's I've tried in area lately! I'm moving on!!

tpMRfKK9msfUaDXx8qv1JQ.text: Do not go here or any chilis. I ordered take out they forgot half my order and the food was old and dry. Highly pissed calling corporate.

MwS1JKthEugJVl2pnu7-kQ.text: Came in on Cinco de Mayo to get some chain Tex/Mex food. They had an all you can eat fajitas special on a Monday night. Sat at the bar since NO ONE was in it and got great service from bartender. My first draught beer was a little warm, but the second was nice and cold! Kitchen took forever to get my order out with people coming in after me getting their food before. The fajitas where very good indeed after the wait. Since I got all you can eat, they give you progressively less so your stomach can catch up which is good cause the steak was very filling!  You really can never go wrong with these guys, but just keep in mind to pace yourself. Chips and salsa are always a good thing here to say the least!

NxJB4pMh4BgFQvrH80sHPw.text: This will be my last visit. It hasn't always been this way and I have had good service and food in the past but the last two visits have been less than good. First the place was empty at 1pm on a Saturday which should be the first clue. No one seems particularly interested in the few customers they had and our drinks took quite awhile even with minimal customers. Food came out fast and was overall ok. But with so many places to eat I  am officially moving on.

PpobBoqMbgEJyd90zs43Xw.text: We had the smoked wings tossed in wing sauce...really excellent. Our waiter Gandy was exceptional! The enchiladas we quite good, in all a very nice experience.

gAixY3-7AZMMChTngfHjaA.text: Food - C Service - F  Slow service, never brought my appetizer but tried to charge me for it. One refill in an hour. Worst service I've had in the area.

UM2VdvMK2CYFqjdxiGPtPA.text: Good place to go for a quick and simple lunch. Typical chain restaurant nothing special.

kZ_hrtp-iL98svlH1-YGOQ.text: This was our first time here and the place was just ok. I did not like the burger I ordered. My wife's salad was good. We ordered the chips and salsa for an app and its bottomless so that is nice. Not sure we will be back anytime soon.

ozSDn_O7gsbnyHzFHku9MA.text: The food is great but this place is close to being like applebees and that's bad, horrible service and very rude, I tip very well but they don't deserve it, I rather tip the cooks

oHnYsRW42Dy8A1GMr7H85Q.text: I have visited this place twice.it has very good food.i like flat pizzas here.for pure veggies the options are very very less.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Soup
Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Flat pizza

njffcpcJD_9QCk-rmgNugg.text: Food was okay. Ordered our burgers medium rare and they were served medium well. I understand the need to cook meat through for food safety. But... If the meat quality is good this shouldn't be an issue. I don't like medium well, which is why I ordered medium rare. It is stated on the menu that the burgers are served medium well.  Don't ask how we want it done if that's not a option and you are going to serve it the way you want, irrelevant of how we order. Service was good although another issue is if you're paying by credit card, we were told to swipe the card at the order machine on the table. Our server was good, but isn't that his job?   With order machine at the table and paying ourself, the wait staff is less attentive and drinks were slow to be refilled or reordered, oh wait we do that ourselves on the machine in the table.  Customer service is lacking, maybe I'm old fashioned, by why are we tipping if we are doing the ordering and paying ourselves?

2pG0b3O4_4fECBdihPfEsA.text: I placed Order on the Chilis to Go app at 4:41pm on a Wednesday. The app stated the order would be ready at 5:07pm. I arrived at 5:12 and they had not even put my order together. They were not busy. Why even have an app or online ordering if the business is not paying attention to it.

6EXxY92XLOD3NYnqJFzR0g.text: This visit to Chili's has been wonderful. I wasn't sure I would ever return to a Chili's after my last experience in Gastonia, NC, but I'm glad I gave in to my craving for Chicken Crispers.   Service was great, food was amazing, what else can you ask for?

4U505_ONC43hVkP0OoAlhA.text: Nothing wrong here, just a typical Chili's.  I really actually like their burgers, can't lie.  To be perfectly honest though, my little 7 y/o daughter is usually the reason that I come here.  She is in love with macaroni and cheese and for some reason she associates Chili's with good mac'n'cheese.  7 year old logic at it's best!  Don't shun this place though, solid food, solid service and very affordable.

7P0HzJbulY5H7zHHCMP3YQ.text: This is a pretty busy location right off of Independence.  Went here on a Friday night and the hostess seemed a little lost and confused, but we managed to get a table right away (for 7pm).  I would call that early on a Friday, but still...  Our server came by and greeted us and took our orders.  Seemed like a lot of people were celebrating birthdays because we kept hearing the Chili's version of Happy Birthday being sung every 5 mins.  I guess that is why the food took forever to come out.  I wouldn't have minded, but I had the cajun pasta and it was.. okay - some of the pasta was overcooked.  Overall, not the best Chili's experience... maybe it was just a bad night.  This is one of those times where service really effected the food experience for me.

znqkVBXenRBqnxf7ufRKsQ.text: The meal was "ok" but we were overcharged for a side order of rice and beans 3.96 (these are usually .99 at our hometown Chili's) and the rice was not cooked completely. Will not be back to Chili's for a while and never to this one again. This was not worth the $30 for two nor the low quality of food. Maybe that's why the parking lot was empty.....

Lsu2d0oaTKTW3euQ2A8jBg.text: The customer service from the hostess is very bad .she seats who she wants and greets who she wants if she worked for me she would not have a job. Customer service is the most important part of this business and they have none lets see if the rest of this trip is better as we go

K1NHkPTH_jw-XcXiqgws0A.text: I ordered the jumbo soft pretzels and the Bacon ranch steak quesadillas. I hope its all good. I'm sick of driving all over East Charlotte in an attempt to find something better than a 2 star restaurant and more importantly one that takes American Express. The restaurant is pretty empty. I thinly my waitress's name is Angie. The pretzels were pretty good but overpriced. The quesadillas were flavorless and filled with fatty meat. Ugh. Unfortunately with a tip included the bill was $23. That's way too much for mediocre food. The Chili's on my side of town has better food than this one does. I won't be returning.

G7dZh7iqgg7BSTPvQ0hO9A.text: We sat at the bar on New Year's Day to use a gift card. The Bartender gave good service but the food runner was not friendly at all. As for the food, it was not up to par. The southwestern egg rolls were good as they are at any Chilis I've been to. The beef tacos did not have seasoning. The beans that came with the tacos were cold and the rice was under cooked. We don't frequent Chilis a lot but this by far was the worst one food wise. We heard others complaining about cold beans as well. Their beer cooler was also broken and they had only two beers on draft. Unless I get another gift card here I won't go back.

3U0q0ZpUQ_KxbrMZm0p5pA.text: This is probably my last time going to this chili's. I waited about 30mins for my entrees after I was done with the appetizers. That was whatever but my food came out  almost room temperature. So I told the server I wanna get new one. The 2nd tasted so bland and it was watery... so I waited for an hrs to get my entrees and I still had to pay the entire bill.

ZHEY0hmlHOfxOoTyTksgJg.text: This particular Chili's has THE best burgers I've had in awhile. Juicy--cooked to your specs (med rare, well-done, etc). The staff is always polite and helpful as well as attentive.   This opinion is from dining in and take out--both are stellar.

UxOryhnWRkXHVxe_AASeKg.text: This location is terrible. Food was not good and the cleanliness of the restaurant is less than satisfactory. The floor is covered in various debris and very sticky. I will not be coming back.

ATYGtM6b7IEa2W2Dj8Bx_g.text: This chilis is the absolute WORST. Please don't waste your time eating here. We come to this one because it's closest to our house. We tolerated the bad service just because it's somewhere close to eat with a variety of choices. The last handful of times we came here the service was bad, they skipped on portions and the food wasn't quality. But it's what happened during our last visit that we will not be back. We were sitting waiting for our food and about 3 of the staff workers were on the other side of our table talking, rolling up silverware and they were gossiping so loud. We couldn't even talk amongst ourselves because they were so loud. They would talk English and then switch to Spanish when they started talking about people (I'm guessing they were talking crap) and then they would switch back to English. It was so annoying and rude. Our waitress walked passed our table about 3 times before my husband had to wave her down for a refill.  We got our food and it was burnt and I wouldn't eat it. I waited about 5 minutes for the waitress to come back around, but she didn't even look at us. Eventually my husband asked one of the employees that have been gossiping for about 20 mins to get our waitress.  They took our food back to remake and it took them about 20 more minutes to bring it back out and it was STILL burnt. What really upset me was that the person that brought it out was a regular cook. It was no manager or anything. AND the cook didn't even say sorry or ask if she can get us anything. She literally dropped it off and ran off. And it was still burnt!! We waited for the waitress and again she never showed up, we had to track her down. We ended up just leaving. I have never have been so angry at a restaurant. I would give it a another chance, because I know stuff happens. But the couple times before that weren't the best and I'm done giving them more chances. Not to mention this place is DIRTY. One time we were there and they sat us and there was straw wrappers and stuff in the table from the last guest and the girl that sat us said "do you want me to clean this up?" ...... uhhh, shouldn't you have already done that??? Also, the floors are gross like they don't pick stuff up and it's slippery. If you want chilis that bad, drive to a different one. Or take it to go. But make sure it's not burnt.

IR0A6s1p1PWF8bD_f-4wZg.text: My nephew treated me for Mother's Day, ribs are delicious, tender. seasoned well.  The service was good.

_0tALjwpgWkslz-vwC_ghw.text: Visited this location this past Saturday (10/27/18) around 9pm. The hostess was very pleasant and we were seated in a section between the bar and and some windows. There was a large party with a lot of young kids seated near us who looked like they'd been waiting awhile so we assumed that we had a wait in front of us as well. No big deal since it was a Saturday night and we didn't come for the gourmet service. I was also really excited about the local craft beer selection.   There was some type of silverware station on the other side of our booth where a female employee (looked around 16-17 years old) asked an older white male employee not to do something. (No idea what, I wasn't really paying attention.) The older white male instantly started yelling at her to mind her own business. She nicely asked him to calm down and he began a very loud, very whiny tirade including but not limited to "fuck" and "bitch." She firmly told him not to curse so he did it some more as he walked away. (I will refer to him as "whiny pants guy" for the rest of this review.)   As the dust is settling our server shows up at our table to greet us and take our drink orders. (Roughly 15 minutes after being seated.) He was very personable and gave my partner some beer recommendations. As we're waiting for drinks that will never come we hear the female employee reporting what happened to a different older white dude. She's upset. He doesn't care and brushes her off because he's busy right now. We don't hear anything else for another 10 minutes and I assume that the situation was settled in the back. Two staff members show up in our section to speak to the large party that was seated near us.  They're not there to apologize for the behavior of whiny pants dude. They have run out of pasta and can't fill all of the orders for the table. (Not sure how long that party had been waiting. They must have ordered before we sat down and we had invested 25 minutes into our table.)   A few more drinkless minutes go by and our server walks by (with no drinks) talking with the girl from earlier telling her she shouldn't be starting things. My parter and I grab our stuff and leave.   I understand that the food industry is a stressful environment. I've seen 2 consenting Waffle House waitresses scream at each other across a restaurant at 2am. This was different. It was verbal abuse and blatant disrespect of an employee in front of young children.

aHOw3XZ3sFILca5Q_i6uiQ.text: My friends and I had a good experience. The wait on Saturday night was longer than expected, but we didn't mind to much. Shortly after being seated, we looked at the menus and ordered. Our waitress was nice enough and the food was great! Parking was easy to find, and restroom was clean.

Ga75ovA7WGMeVMYd2y4b7A.text: Great environment, young and happy workers!! We were greeted right away when we came in and our server Savannah was very considerate, patient and nice. I wish we could have tipped her more. We got a good serving and greatly prepared hot and ready food, delish!! I loved the steak and shrimp fajita's dinner item. Our son loved his mushroom and swiss big burger combo with all the fresh toppings of a burger, tomatoes, lettuce, onions along with the sauteed mushrooms and swiss cheese. The manager of the store I think his name was Clint was by far outstanding to hear any concerns and my steak on the fajitas was tender and easy to chew. Hey, our car battery died while sitting in to eat, it has been cold. So one of the waitresses let him borrow her truck to give us a good jump in the parking lot to send us even extra happy home!! I love this place and we look forward to coming back soon!! God Bless you guys!

4DrgkgSFRYaM_SXtjBgLEg.text: I have always been a Chili's fan! This is not my favorite location, I've only been about 3 times because of the convenience. The quality of the food is very consistent, but there are two very important things that I look for when spending money at restaurants. First, the cleanliness of the restrooms! I believe that you can tell a lot about the management and employees when walking into the restroom! Ever use a Walmart restroom? That's how I felt tonight when I took my 4 year old to use the restroom and wash her hands before dinner. The restroom was disgusting! I'm not sure if the employees are responsible for cleaning the restrooms, or if they have an outside cleaning service, BUT I would highly recommend Enviro-Master! They specialize in restroom hygiene! They eliminate viruses, order causing bacteria and mold and mildew. To be honest I usually go to restaurants that are services by them! You'll notice a small sticker on the toilet that says "sanitized by Enviro-Master." At that point, rest assured that you are safe! It's very important to protect your employees AND customers! Second, the SERVICE. Our server was very nice. Our experience would have been better if we were "asked" more often than we had to "ask", if that makes sense. I feel if I order an appetizer, I should have to ask for appetizer plates. As well as to go boxes, bag, check. Overall the food is good at this location, but as far as everything else, there's always room for improvements!!! If you know what I mean....

A6bEJBLaYBkRydtZ5fteBQ.text: Holy moly moo cows, batman, what the heck? Beer was nearly flat, fries over seasoned to the point of being inedible (i tried wiping them off, wasn't worth the effort), I paid an extra dollar for the world's saddest three slices of avocado, I'm pretty sure the egg on my burger was microwaved or simply crafted from rubber, and it took right under 40 minutes from when I placed my order to when I received it. The server/bartender, Stan?, was nice, but too busy to be all that attentive. Additionally, the couple at the table beside me both ordered some sort of shrimp and chicken pasta. Neither one of them got the shrimp with their entree and had to wait for another 10 or so minutes to get it.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Saddest slices of avocado

UTnzo3OU09k7SKWLQsoOmQ.text: Stay away. Drive another mile down the road and you will have a lot of other options which not being from Charlotte we did not know. Food and service were awful.

lFNjbEGnx8wU7Wa7SSPqXA.text: When i arrived a waiter took our drink orders, i didn't see him again until he came out of the back with other workers to celebrate a customer's birthday. We waited patiently still, then another waiter came and took our drink orders. By this time, we had already been there over 20 minutes so we were ready to order. I ordered the original chicken crispers with a double order of the southwest mac and cheese and my wife had the southwest eggrolls. After the food arrived, my wife's eggrolls were burnt and my double southwest mac and cheese was mostly all cheese with very few noodles. Our waiter did not check on us throughout the meal and i never received a refill on my drink. The only time we saw him again was when i paid at the table and we were getting ready to walk out.

xROah7rAAvhQT_8waBPHlA.text: Food was prepared perfectly and in a timely manner. Our service was outstanding. We had a delightful server named Samantha who went out of her way to make our lunch enjoyable. It's nice to know you can count on consistency of a chain restaurant.

NPPDG7zvc7OeNsY5fhNUUQ.text: This is the worst Chilis I've ever been to. Service is so-so. But in general employees are friendly. But at this place it's more of a shock if your food is actually good than it is bad. At yesterday's visit our queso was so thick it broke the chips. My little ones Mac and cheese was so overly microwaved it was stuck together in clumps and looked almost burnt. Bottom line if your going to pick a chain restaurant head across the street to Buffalo Wild Wings.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Queso so was so thick it broke the chips and that is just a piece of my little ones over microwaved clumped up Mac and cheese

KqdjQq-j6f8IBCzV7z_rCQ.text: Took my cousin here for her birthday she loved it I was underwhelmed by the whole thing but I suppose it is what you expect from a chili's

tkgtryDEs4zYTath3Mn1wA.text: Chili's is my place. It always satisfies and it's friendly to my wallet. The chips and salsa are a must but it's hard to put them down so come meal time, I get full fast! The Presidente Margarita is bomb.com. The Chili's on Sardis road doesn't get too crowded when we visit so we are seated immediately and I love it. My fiance and I are regular here.

RN10h8KpPnbimmTjqCAZ_w.text: Wish they would bring back fried cheese sticks abd fried apples! Finally got app to work! Yea!

xDPMKFArGYT26V-aaHWu7w.text: Absolutely DISGUSTING! Shrimp fajitas made in conveyer belt oven now HORRIBLE! Cajun pasta was Viola' from Walmart I'm certain of it and the "chicken" on the pasta definitely man made! Will NEVER return to ANY CHILI'S

cZisWuxwHuqaxmU2uu9lrg.text: S l o w service! We waited 40 min. for our food, and when we inquired about the meal the server replied, "What your order? Yeah, I've been checking on it, and it ain't ready." "I've been all over this area but I've been checking on your order."  Perhaps they are under staffed.

tMBcXLil455bzPJtHzqYdg.text: There's too many restaurants in this area that are better than this Chilis. The food is mediocre & the place looks dirty. The glass next to our booth was covered in greasy hand prints. Go to Carrabbas or even K & W Cafeteria. At least there you can see the food before you order it.

HN7hEs7khbZ1lW2vVXmqQg.text: This chili's location was ok.   When I walked in for lunch, I was immediately seated. However, my server walked past me plenty before letting me know she'd be with me. She was nice yet slow with everything else.   I ate a side salad and honey chipotle boneless wings. The food was good except the wings seems a little over cooked.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. House Side Salad
Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Boneless Wings Honey-Chipotle

cxIjPos-SDequkW6jnHHew.text: The ONLY reason that this has 2 stars instead of 1 is because of my server, Timothy. When he wasn't babysitting (yes babysitting a child so that a server could tend to her tables) he was very welcoming and attentive.   I saw one server carry a child which, as it happens belongs to her, as a restaurant professional this is absolutely a NO GO!! The man that I am assuming was the one in charge seemed to be more interested in playing around with the staff instead of running the restaurant.   I will not return to location.

GjBxU354BRCxdW08_aLvYw.text: Walked in and walked out due that no one came to the hostess stand to greet and meet, went unnoticed.  Here @ Buffalo Wings now. Chili's acting like they had a line out the door, lol.  Reason why many businesses are failing and closing due to lack of customer service.

DsH249bNfumRERJGX2H1Ag.text: Came to this location and I guess I got what I paid for. Our server was very nice but the actual service sucked. Took forever to get out appetizers and the food came out less than 1 minute later. We are our entire meals without being checked on and without drinks we ordered. By the end our waiter was no where to be found but magically showed up after someone else gave us our bills and take out boxes.

85W_BmCjb0rwxk4NS9c5Ug.text: We have been here a few times. It's usually slow when we are here. The food is ok. It's nothing to brag about. I'm not a fan of eating out but sometimes you just have to. Today was one of those days. The salad was bland. Could have been more fresh. My husband enjoyed his fajitas. Refills took longer than usual to get taken care of. Our pay machine was not working. It took us about 15 extra minutes to pay because our waiter disappeared. On another note, our waiter super friendly and did a fine job. If you are expecting top of the notch food, this isn't where you are going to find it. But it's good when there aren't many options to choose from.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Grilled Chicken Fajitas toppings
Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken tender salad
Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Grilled Chicken Fajitas

BcEirkjFvttgMR0tWHGbfQ.text: Almost didn't stop due to bad reviews. Happily everything was perfect...food, people and cleanliness were on point. Will definitely be back!!! Apparently a new General Manager can make a world of difference.

R4bC7n3cyLvYTopaI8PAIw.text: It took about 8 minutes to be waited on at the bar that only had another couple. The two stars mostly reflects the cleanliness of the the establishment. It was absolutely filthy for it to be slow on a Tuesday but that shouldnt be an excuse for it not to be clean. While I did enjoy the fried pickles and the mix drink the environment reminded me of eating on a NYC subway...The bar and seats were sticky. From my view sitting at the end of the bar the kitchen had food and garbage on the floor.  Luckily our our  bartender Tim was friendly. (Service with a smile, but not sure he wanted to be there)

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Dirty Kitchen.

7xDJMaMx2vgEmDyo6cyuEw.text: Had lunch with my friend at this location today. The food was delicious AND the service was great. Our server Harley was fantastic as was our look alike Chris Helmsworth waiter. Sorry I didn't get his name!! Really nice afternoon!!

WmBdlVXbEF4vrM0tcH3Xpg.text: Thoroughly happy with my order! Chili's is my "go to" when I just need that meal that I know is going to satisfy my hunger. Placed an online order for the Triple Dipper (southwestern egg rolls, big mouth bites, and crispy honey chipotle crispers) and it was ready well before the estimated time! All I had to do was pay when I got there and my food came right out.

-5qKD9hBHRL-Hl-O7eA6Yw.text: They still can't get a burger (or anything else for that matter) right. We went there on Friday night mainly for a Margarita, to tell the truth. My wife ordered a chicken dish, I don't trust their cooking but I figured they could at least get the burger right? I ordered the "big, fat, juicy just bacon burger" medium RARE. I told the waiter RARE 3 times!  A long long way long time later we get our food and my big fat juicy burger is flat, dry and very well done, I had to chase my waiter to take it back.    Honestly, the chicken was like what you'd get on a domestic airline but worse. My wife who's a very slow eater naturally anyway slowed down her meal as much as she could, but she still finished way before I got my burger. The waiter didn't follow through on my order and just let it ride like the previous time. The burger was again flattened like a pancake almost twice the size of the bun (nothing like the picture on the menu) and burned to crisp, I mean burned! This time I was ready and grabbed the waiter before he ran off and told him to get the manager pronto.  Several minutes later I get up, walk up to the receptionist and ask again for the manager, she informs me that they know but the manager is busy - the restaurant is at 60% capacity, so busy but not crazy busy.  I go back to my table, and a few minutes later remind the waiter, he too tells me the manager is busy.  Too busy for clients? I warn the waiter we're walking out. The manager shows up 3 minutes later and apologizes. I show him the flat burned out burger pancake and explain the problem. His excuse is they don't do medium rare they do pink, my wife pointed out you can't do pink when you flatten it out like that, the manager then tried to justify it with some story about mashed burgers.  So I left the restaurant after nearly an hour, still on empty stomach and angry as hell.

k2utd1Jmqvji3Ytth9t81Q.text: I loved the service but didn't really enjoy my food. I had some ribs and they were overly salty

9PtbwDOYGD9uk-7jqwUO-A.text: Our server Christian was outstanding! He had the perfect mix of friendliness and professionalism. So much so I am taking the time to call the manager. The food was hot and quick but Christian was definitely the best part.

HciKjC0_b6tVFFmGUKQ22A.text: You really try to be positive and optimistic in your reviews , eager to just leave bursting words of excitement but Chili's kicked all that hope and optimism out of you .  The service here will always be subpar, wait just plain old HORRIBLE.    I can't waste money on dysfunctional attitudes anymore . My last visit to this location and probably any Chili's chain ever again . Not like they care , right .

wnpliTjygNXyQbVGStKDMA.text: We went to this chili's yesterday. 1st off we got sat in a super noisy section full of screaming kids.... we sat in that section for 10 mins ungreeted. The waiter came out talked to a table and went back into the back without even greeting us or getting us waters. We asked to change sections and in the next section we waited ANOTHER 10 mins before being greeted even though the server came out maybe twice... once we were finally greeted we didn't even get a name or introduction from our waiter. We went ahead and ordered drinks, food, and asked for the check because we could tell we wouldn't see him again anytime soon. The food came out and we had to ask for the check 3 more times because he kept forgetting. The food was terrible, which normally chili's food is awesome but this location absolutely sucked. My southwestern cesar salad looked NOTHING like the one on the menu. It was full of nasty, white, tasteless pieces of cheap iceberg lettuce.... the salad wasn't even green. My friend had the shrimp tacos and they were trash. The waiter didn't Check up on us at all, barely came out to check on anyone in the section. I had to walk back up To the host stand twice just to request a waiter. All in all this was the worst service ever at a restaurant it was total trash. I'm unsure how this establishment is still running. The staff can't multitask in the slightest.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Was supposed to be a Southwest chicken Cesar.... this is 2 completely different salads.. this was trash

i1Rz3U-jB8PLrjhISg7bew.text: Dirty floors and food everywhere on the floor.  Even the workers were slipping around.  It was hard to get someone's attention to take my to-go order even though the employees see you (look right through you).  The guy that eventually helped me was nice enough and he did check my order to make sure it was correct before I paid which is why they get the extra star.  I ordered the meat trio thing that I saw on a commercial.  Really bad and pretty inedible.  The meat was thin, tough and fatty.  I ended up throwing it away and making a sandwich.  Definitely won't be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Smokehouse Combo to go with quinoa &amp; broccoli

DWr34pyIlEm7Ajh13_nl0Q.text: I typically try to avoid this location. Chili's isn't my favorite but the mister likes the mango chicken or the margarita chicken.   When I go, I usually order the sirloin with mashed potatoes and upgrade a side for asparagus with cherry potatoes.   Tonight, either they were just slammed because partial of the restaurant was under renovations but our order came slower than usual.   Our oldest daughter ordered chicken bites but we were told the kitchen staff ended up burning them so they made her chicken tenders and were going to comp the kiddie meal off the ticket. Pretty decent. We didn't say much but were pleased they took considerations.   My complaint was the salt level on the food. Both our full menu items (sirloin and the mango chicken) Disappointment occurred with my asparagus. I upgraded a side only to not be able to eat any. :(   I'm glad at least they are in the mist of renovation as the entire place needs an overhaul.

photos.caption: Photo of Chili's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Medium rare 6oz steak with mashed potatoes and upgrade side of garlic asparagus with cherry tomatoes

OzzYxC5vO7aacbJ9AYJG-g.text: Food is good but, the margarita special seems to mean that you pay a 12 ounce price for a 4 ounce drink. Yikes!

y3R5WkAe2a2P9VKgw5CD7g.text: Eat here on Friday night about 7:00. First they where out of standard baby back ribs. I think that was ridiculous. Very poor planning on management part. Then the floor was filthy. When brought to managements attention I was told it was due to the type of flooring they had. The hamburger I finally settled on was very good.

ukT7OOgQiUJxaU0L5ZLxOw.text: Over the years I have not been a huge fan of Chili's. However, since recently returning to my meat-eating behaviors, I've been a bit selective about my choices of proteins. Chili's offers a grass-fed burger patty for $1.00 more, which wins my vote over other places.   As a food safety educator, I am always picky about the cleanliness of a restaurant. Upon entry, I noticed tables that were not bussed, though they did not seem to be understaffed. Usually a big no-no for me. However, the greeter was sure to place us at a table and thoroughly clean it to our liking. Earned their point back.   The food was delivered to the table exactly as ordered. I requested sauces on the side and a slight char to the burger....achieved.  Our server was quite hospitable and attentive.   In comparison to other locations, it was a positive experience. Certainly can not same the same for the Charlotte-Whitehall location. But, that's another review for another day.

pDDfaZpvOzOjEvTQcI6gqw.text: Went there tonight to decompress from the work day where I found myself ignored by the bartender in her service area.  I had to do hand signals like I was guiding a plane to its respective gate in order to receive service on multiple occasions each time I wanted to add to my order.  Really?!! Finally became calmly frustrated then walked to the bar in order to pay my tab because I was sitting at a table in her section.  I never received the additional salsa requested 15 minutes earlier while I watched her serve 4 others in the same section.  As I paid my bill I reminded her that I had requested more salsa. She smugly told me that she was "busy."  I reminded her that we all are busy.  Really? She was too busy to take of a paying customer? WOW!
